maqras.text: Rea midi peid hawxk khxng cea kæ cea dxk hrux
læa rea di pldpeluxng phara hnak khxng cea xxk cak cea læw
sung pen phara hnak xung bn hlang khxng cea
læa rea di ykyxng hı kæ cea læw sung kar klaw thung cea
chanan thæcring hlangcak khwam yak labak k ca mi khwam ngay
thæcring hlangcak khwam yak labak k ca mi khwam ngay
dangnan meux cea serc sin (cak ngan hnung læw) k cng labak tx pi
læa yang phracea khxng cea theanan k thi cea cng mung prarthna theid
khx saban dwy tn madeux læa tn makxk
læa dwy phu khea dur si nay
læa dwy meuxng ni thi plxdphay
doy nænxn rea di bangkeid mnusʹy ma nı rup bæb thi swyngam ying
læw rea di hı khea klab su sphaph thi tkta thi tkta ying
nxkcak brrda phu sraththa læa prakxb sing di ngam thanghlay doythi sahrab phwk khea ca di rab rangwal xyang mimi thi sinsud
dangnan xari lea thi thahı khea ptiseth cea nı phayhlang keiyw kab kar txbthæn
mi chı xallxhˌ dxk hrux pen phu tadsin thi di yeiym nı hmu phu tadsin thanghlay
cng xan dwy phranam hæng phracea khxng cea phuthrng bangkeid
thrng bangkeid mnusʹy cak kxn leuxd
cng xan theid læa phracea khxng cea nan phuthrng cıbuy ying
phuthrng sxn kar chı pakka
phuthrng sxn mnusʹy nı sing thi khea miru
michı chen nan thæcring mnusʹy nan yxm ca lameid khxbkhet
neuxng pheraa khea khid wa khea phx pheiyng læw
thæcring yang phracea khxng cea theanan khux kark lab pi
cea hen læw michı hrux phu thi khxy khadkhwang
baw khn hnung meux khea kalang lahmad
cea khid bang him wa hak baw phu nan xyu bn næwthang thi thuk txng
hrux khea di chı hı phukhn mi khwam yakerng
cea khid bang him wa hak khea ptiseth læa phinhlanghı
khea miru dxk hrux wa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng hen
michı chen nan tha khea yang mi hyud yang rea ca cik khea thi khmxm xyang nænxn
khmxm thi kohk thi praphvti chaw
læw hı khea reiyk thi prachum khxng khea
rea k ca reiyk phu khum nrk
Michı chen nan cea xya di cheuxfang man tæ cng suyu d læa khea kıl xallxhˌ theid
thæcring rea di pra tha nxalkurxan lng ma nı khun xal k xdrˌ
læa xari lea ca thahı cea ru di wa khun xal k xdrˌ nan khux xari
khun xal k xdrˌ nan di ying kwa hnung phan deuxn
br rda mla xik ahˌ læa xal ruhˌ (yib ril) ca lng ma nı khun nan doy xnumati hæng phracea khxng phwk khea neuxngcak kickar thuk sing
khun nan mi khwam santi cnkrathang rungxrun
brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nı hmu xahˌ lu lki tab læa phwk bucha cewd nan ca mi hludphn cak (hlak sraththa khxng phwk khea) cnkwa ca di mi hlakthan xan chad cæng mayang phwk khea
khux rx su l khn hnung ca kxallxhˌ pheux xan khamphir xan brisuththi
nı khamphir nan mi bayyati xan theiyngtrng
læa brrda phu thi di rab khamphir (xahˌ lu lki tab) nan midi tækyæk kan wentæ hlangcak thi di mi hlakthan xan chad cæng mayang phwk khea læw

læa phwk khea midi thuk baycha hı kratha xun dı nxkcak pheux khearph phakdi tx xallxhˌ pen phu mi cetna brisuththi nı kar phakdi tx phraxngkh pen phu xyu nı næwthang thi theiyngtrng læa darng kar lahmad læa cay sa kat læa nanhæla khux sasna xan theiyngthrrm
thæcring brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nı hmu xahˌ lu lki tab læa bucha cewd nan ca xyu nı nrk yahannam phwk khea pen phu phanak xyu nı nan tlxd kal chn hela nan phwk khea pen mnusʹy thi chawcha ying
thæcring brrda phu sraththa læa prakxb khwam di thanghlay chn hela nan phwk khea pen mnusʹy thi di ying

kar txbthæn khxng phwk khea n thi phracea khxng phwk khea khux swn swrrkh hlakhlay xan sthaphr n beuxng lang khxng man mi lana hlay say hil phan phwk khea pen phu phanak xyu nı nan tlxd kal xallxhˌ thrng piti tx phwk khea læa phwk khea k yindi nı phraxngkh nan khux sahrab phu thi klaw kerng phracea khxng phwk khea
meux phændin thuk hı hiw xyang san sathan khxng man
læa meux phændin di rabay khxng hnak khxng man xxk ma
Læa mnusʹy ca klaw wa keid xari khun kæ man lea
nı wan nan man ca bxk khawkhraw khxng man
wa thæcring phracea di mi baycha kæ man
nı wan nan mnusʹy ca kracay xxk ma pen hmu «pheux phwk khea ca thuk hı hen phl ngan khxng phwk khea
dangnan phu dı kratha khwam di hnak thea laxxng thuli khea k ca hen man
swn phu dı kratha khwam chaw hnak thea laxxng thuli khea k ca hen man
khx saban dwy ma thi sngseiyng hxb khna wing
læw dwy ma thi kib thea khxng man ti kab hin cn keid prakay fi
læw dwy ma thi cucom satru nı yam chea
læw man di thahı fun tlb fung nı yam nan
læw man di buk kheapi thamklang hmu satru nı yam nan
thæcring mnusʹy pen phu nerkhun tx phracea khxng khea
læa thæcring khea di pen phyan tx kar nan xyang nænxn
læa thæcring khea mi khwam hwnghæn pheraa rak nı thraphysmbati
